item.title: Here are your Xbox Game Pass games for November
item.content:encoded:
Black Ops 7! Sniper Elite Resistance! Whiskerwood!

Microsoft has just announced the newest roster of games coming to Xbox Game Pass in November. Take down those halloween decorations already, October is donezo.

Leading the charge this month is Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, an absolutely massive FPS release that you can play the same day it releases this month. How exciting!

The full list of Xbox Game Pass games for November 2025 is as follows:

  • Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 (Cloud, Console, and PC) - November 14 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.
  • Dead Static Drive (Cloud, Console, and PC) - November 5 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.
  • Sniper Elite: Resistance (Cloud, Console, and PC) - November 5 for Game Pass Premium.
  • Egging On (Cloud, Xbox Series X/S, and PC) - November 6 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.
  • Whiskerwood (PC) - November 6 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.
  • Voidtrain (Cloud, Xbox Series X/S, PC) - November 7 for Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass Premium, and PC Game Pass.
  • Great God Grove (Cloud, Xbox Series X/S, and PC) - November 11 for Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass Premium, and PC Game Pass
  • Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris (Cloud, Console, and PC) - November 11 for Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass Premium, and PC Game Pass.
  • Pigeon Simulator (Cloud, Xbox Series X/S, PC) - November 11 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.
  • Relic Hunters Legend (Cloud, Console, PC) - November 12 for Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass Premium, and PC Game Pass.
  • Winter Burrow (Cloud, Console, PC) - November 12 for Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 comes soon following a very popular beta period, in which the developers at Treyarch offered some interesting gameplay twists which players seemed to love.

Sniper Elite Resistance is another barn burner you should absolutely check out, described as "a challenging, rewarding, and deeply satisfying adventure" in Eurogamer's review.

However, with new games coming to the Game Pass service, it does mean a selection of games will be leaving the library on the 15th November. These games are:

  • Blacksmith Master (Game Preview) (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • Football Manager 2024 (PC)
  • Football Manager 2024 Console Edition (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • Frostpunk (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • Spirittea (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 Heart of Chernobyl (Cloud, Console, and PC)
